short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy and fast real time access of Code Hero Challenges and Tasks for the Students

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Access to the Student's Code Hero Challenges and Tasks.

Ability to view Challenges and their instructions, points, status and tasks.
Ability to view task's instructions and status.
Ability to update the task's status.
Ability to print the instructions.
Ability to view instructions while performing activity on the sites like Scratch, code.org and many more.
